meta.description: Transportation planning for a manufacturing company

params.name: pollution
params.description: Pollution generated per trip by each transport mode

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of products per trip for each transport mode

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips for each transport mode

vars.name: y
vars.description: y[m] = 1 if transport mode m is used, 0 otherwise

objective.name: minimize_trips
objective.description: Minimize the total number of trips

constraints.name: total_pollution
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(pollution[m] * trips[m] for m in TRANSPORT_MODES)
constraints.description: Total pollution must not exceed 2000 units

constraints.name: total_capacity
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(capacity[m] * trips[m] for m in TRANSPORT_MODES)
constraints.description: Total transported products must be at least 1800 units

constraints.name: trucks_minimum
constraints.description: Trucks must be used at least 10 times

constraints.name: van_or_electric
constraints.description: Only one of vans or electric vehicles can be used

constraints.name: trips_vans
constraints.description: Trips for vans are zero if vans are not used

constraints.name: trips_electric_vehicles
constraints.description: Trips for electric vehicles are zero if electric vehicles are not used
